ex2

Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • ex2.SpaceShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Energy, Health, Shootable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyShip, HumanControlledShip

    public abstract class SpaceShip
extends java.lang.Object
implements Energy, Health, Shootable
    Class represent the abstract SpaceShip in the game. Each ship subclass of this class is an object will be part of the game.
    Author:
    Oop staff and Yoni Mantzur
    See Also:
    Energy, Health, Shootable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NO_TURN
      The human player can move as decided to, no turn means 0.
      static int TURN_LEFT
      The human player can move as decided to, left turn means 1.
      static int TURN_RIGHT
      The SHIP can move as decided to, right turn means -1.

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction(SpaceWars game)
        Does the actions of this ship for this round. This is called once per round by the SpaceWars game driver.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.

      • collidedWithAnotherShip

        public void collidedWithAnotherShip()
        This method is called every time a collision with this ship occurs Bashing - is when ship has been collided with other ship and the shields was on

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is called whenever a ship has died. It resets the ship's attributes, and starts it at a new random position.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Checks if this ship is dead.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is dead. false otherwise.

      • getPhysics

        Gets the physics object that controls this ship.
        Returns:
        the physics object that controls the ship.

      • gotHit

        public void gotHit()
        This method is called by the SpaceWars game object when ever this ship gets hit by a shot.

      • getImage

        public abstract java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets the image of this ship. This method should return the image of the ship with or without the shield. This will be displayed on the GUI at the end of the round.
        Returns:
        the image of this ship.

        Returns:
